calculateFee(uint256,bool,bytes32).details: Calculated the amount of fee for the particular bridge operation.

params._feeType: type of the fee, should be either HOME_FEE of FOREIGN_FEE.
params._recover: true, if the fee was already subtracted from the given _value and needs to be restored.
params._value: bridged amount of tokens/coins for which fee amount is calculated.
